songs.title: Next Life
songs.lyrics:
[Snippet]

It's always the same
Found the pain after midnight
Fucking, then we fight, making marks 'til it feels right
[?] no, they never end
Every time you fuck up we can still be friends
You fuck it up

[Chorus]
Maybe in the next life
Maybe you would think twice
Maybe I would take my pride
And walk out the door
